alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sheridan County through 445 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plentywood, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plentywood, Westby, Port Of Raymond, Raymond, Dooley, Comertown and Coalridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
